accounts_updated: The Ledger Vault platform has been updated. Find out more in the <1><0>release notes</1></0>
desc: You must define the operation rules before you can create operations in this account
desc_approve: The operation rules has been re-created. You can approve the pending request

title: Action required
unable_access: Before you start using the Ledger Vault, you must re-create your account(s) by providing the name and operation rules for each of them.
